text: A mass shooting took place at a Walmart store in El Paso, Texas, United States, on the morning of August 3, 2019. The gunman killed 22 people and injured 24 more. The FBI is investigating the shooting as an act of domestic terrorism and a possible hate crime. Patrick Wood Crusius, age 21, was arrested shortly after the shooting began and charged with capital murder. The 2019 Dayton shooting occurred the following day. ==References== Category:2019 mass shootings in the United States Category:2010s crimes in Texas Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in 2019 Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the United States Category:Attacks on shops Category:August 2019 events Category:Deaths by firearm in Texas 2019 shooting Category:Mass shootings in Texas Category:Terrorist attacks in the United States Category:Terrorist incidents in 2019 Category:2019 in Texas
title: 2019 El Paso shooting
